caption.center: ELI LARA D/B/A RADIO FAMILIAR A/K/A CENTRO FAMILIAR CRISTIANO, Appellant,

court.center: Court of Appeals of Texas, Fifth District, Dallas.

opinion.posture:
On Appeal from the County Court at Law No. 2, Dallas County, Texas, Trial Court Cause No. 03-3325-B.
Dismiss.
opinion.panel: Before Justices WHITTINGTON, MOSELEY, and LANG-MIERS.
opinion.opinion_text:
In letters dated May 5, 2005, we informed appellant he had not yet paid his $125 filing fee or filed his docketing statement with the Court. We instructed appellant to do so within ten days of the date of the letters and cautioned him that his appeal would be dismissed if he did not comply with our letters. To date, appellant has not responded.
On the Court's own motion, we dismiss this case for want of prosecution. See Tex.R.App.P. 42.3(b).
